description: Continued fraction for fifth root of 4.
references: H. P. Robinson, Letter to N. J. A. Sloane, Nov 13 1973.N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(4^(1/5)); for (n=1, 20000, write("b003118.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 11 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A005533 = Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 11 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
